title: Here's something none of you noticed
body:
Yes, I know kindred is two in one

but kindred is the only champion that has her icon without a body
it's just the face {{champion:203}} 

all the other champions has their face connected to a body

replies.body: Does Wolf even have one to begin with? I thought He was more like a ghost or a cloud of smoke or something not a solid.
OMG AS A KINDRED MAIN I CAN'T BELIEVE I NEVER NOTICED THIS.

It's because you can't really show both characters clearly in such a small portrait, even if it's just their faces. So they had to do something a little different. 

This is the only champ that consists of two beings, so it makes sense for them to have the only portrait like that.
